replies.body:
Riot this really isn't how I wanted my summer holidays to go, I've got 6 weeks to play as much as I want and you give us 4 poro king in a row then 2 ascension?!

Even just a single URF or One For All, the only two playable rotation modes, would make it so much better.

Isn't this meant to be rotating game mode, meaning that in the itme there's meant to be six different weekly gamemodes you've given us two.
Just make URF a custom gamemode LMAO. What are you guys doing?
it really wouldnt be that hard and we've been asking for years and they havent talked about it at all i feel like riot only acts on the feedback they want to hear... its kinda disappointing

Riot please head our call. I have one question. Why are you keeping urf away from us when its what your player base enjoys the most? If u have it as a gamemode that is always up, i'm sure more people will be pulled into the game. You may want people to play norms and ranked and that's fine, I understand. But at least have the rotating gamemode be ROTATING. There has been Poro king for 4 weeks and i understand the Christmas theme so sure. But ascension for 2 weeks!? And if Poro kind is out for 4 weeks for snowdown then there better be 4 weeks of U.R.F for April Fools day. But knowing Rito there will most likely not even BE U.R.F for ONE WEEKEND when its April fools. So please Riot listen to everyone who wants urf back. Please. - Sincerely, Quantum

Oh and also please no ARURF i got the same champs like 10 time while champs i wanted to play (Zed, LB Ezreal etc.) I didn't even get ONCE NOT EVEN ONCE. AND I PLAYED FOR 7 HOURS A DAY! So either fix Arurf or just normal urf please.
Spent my entire holidays thinking I will get as much time to play urf without distractions at least once. I was very very wrong...
Riot pls, give our urs back to us!!!! We are REALLY missing it!
Can we just have urf instead of putting out poro king and ascension every time

don't bother complaining about no URF guys, Riot obviously doesn't care because they can't even be bothered to reply to any of our feedback :P at least reply to our comments Riot. There are kids on websites like "Scratch" who are nicer to their followers than Riot is with the rotating game modes. I'm not saying to make URF a permanent gamemode, but at least once every 2 months would satisfy my quench for URF. Ehh, there's no point in writing this, Riot won't read it... it's meaningless.

I really wanted to play ap warwick again in urf before his rework.{{champion:19}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
{{item:3091}} {{item:3115}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3001}} {{item:3100}} {{item:3089}}
Guys please Old Urf Not this arurf

i feel like riot doesnt even care what modes we actually want on the rotating queue. its just whats convenient for them so they just repeat the same mode for weeks in a row so they dont have to change it so much.. like so many people want more urf but riot doesnt wanna do it unless they can monetize it. i would be playing league every weekend if they had game modes people actually liked. when this queue was announced i was super keen but now they just put less and less effort into it.
WHy do Gamemodes cut out at 3am?
Gamemodes cut out at 3am because you will get the best queue times between 11 and 3
